SEARCH
Package model

Class VIAPets

java.lang.Object
model.VIAPets
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class VIAPets extends Object implements Serializable
The VIAPets class represents the main system for managing bookings, customers, sales, and pets in the VIAPets system. It includes functionality for setting and retrieving kennel slot information, managing bookings, customers, sales, and pets. This class provides methods to update system-wide settings.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Piotr Junosz
